hadiths.text: It was narrated that Mu'adh said:"The Messenger of Allah sent me to Yemen and he commanded me to take one-tenth of whatever is irrigated by the sky, and half of one-tenth of whatever is irrigated by means of buckets

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا يُوجِبُ الْعُشْرَ وَمَا يُوجِبُ نِصْفَ الْعُشْرِ
chapter.eng-name: On What One-Tenth Is Due, And on What One-Half Of One-Tenth Is Due
